Text:
A:6
V:8
M: I didn't watch it, so I don't know.

Ok, for a cam, but I've seen much better. Thanks to scene4all for all his great work.

I put it on my sony TV and it was much better.
V:8

Problem is it goes out of sync part way through. I'm not complaining, just telling you what I got.
Great Torrent, and if you can please upload Sinister (2012)

Good quality cam until about 30 minutes in then goes out of sync by several seconds....movie looked decent until went OOS but unable to finish.

Vid - 7 solid, little washed but watchable!
Aud - 8 very solid, but goes OOS after 30 min so crystal clear, but totally out of sync!
Mov - ?8? only able to watch first half, couldn't take the OOS after that and shut it off.  But does look like very good action flick.
To those experiencing issues with the audio sync i'd suggest using vlc media player on your computer, or if you have a htpc, xbmc allows for A/V offsetting
